data.title: BSH Home Appliances Group
data.meta_description:
BSH Home Appliances Group | 173,948 followers on LinkedIn. BSH is home to both globally established Appliance Brands*, such as Bosch, Siemens, Gaggenau, and Neff, in addition to seven local brands. With our Ecosystem Brand Home Connect and Service Brands such as Simply Yummy and BlueMovement, we offer consumers digital services and sustainable solutions to improve their daily lives.

Founded in 1967, BSH was established as a joint venture between Robert Bosch GmbH (Stuttgart) and Siemens AG (Munich).

BSH presents: our product of the month ğŸ‰ Have you ever had Artificial Intelligence help you in the kitchen? The developments in this area are impressive and kitchen appliances are also becoming increasingly intelligent. Our #Siemens ovens in the iQ700 series with a camera have the AI-powered Individual Browning feature. Users can determine how crispy they like their food on a scale of 1-5. With the help of the camera and AI, the ovens monitor the preparation and switch off automatically as soon as the desired degree of browning is reached. Anyone who is already using the oven with Individual Browning can look forward to a great update: from now on, after a simple software update, the appliances will recognise which food is in the oven thanks to the Food Recognition feature and automatically make the appropriate settings. How does it work? Using a built-in camera and AI, the oven can recognise 40 different dishes, such as pizza or lasagna. It then suggests the appropriate settings and users just have to give their â€œokâ€. The appliance takes over the preparation and automatically switches to the grill function, for example, if the preparation requires it.
